segments.text: I can â€™ t make out anything , the words are too light . I thought they have already changed the toner cartridge this month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems not or somebody has recently received a large fax . Ok , no problem . We do it ourselves .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know how to do it ? I am not so good at machine things . I will have somebody do it as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Check with somebody from the IT department . They are anyway in charge of the office electronic equipment .
segments.speaker: S2
